statements: DELETE FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE initiative_name = 'Renewable Energy Initiative' AND department = 'Finance';
DELETE FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE report_name = 'Quarterly Savings';
DELETE FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND achieved_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM InitiativeReports WHERE initiative_id = 2001 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM procurement_orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 AND vendor_name = 'Vendor XYZ';
DELETE FROM cost_savings_reports WHERE savings_amount < 500 AND savings_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Company';
